entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Cape Dorset
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Dorset Airport 10:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Overcast. High zero.
